attributes.action: Encourage Housing Associations and Local Council Authorites to install wind turbines on roofs to produce clean energy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If Housing Associations and Local Council Authorites install wind turbines on top roofs of the houses they own this would help produce clean energy

It will also help the financially vunerable (single parent families, people with learning disabilities, pensioners etc)
